original_text: And if the bright spot stay in his place, and spread not in the skin, but it be somewhat dark; it is a rising of the burning, and the priest shall pronounce him clean: for it is an inflammation of the burning.
korean_text: 만일 색점이 여전하여 피부에 퍼지지 아니하고 빛이 엷으면 화상으로 부은 것이니 제사장이 그를 정하다 할 것은 이는 화상의 흔적임이니라

sentences.original_text: And if the bright spot stay in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 밝은 반점이 그 자리에 머무른다면

sentences.original_text: and spread not in the skin
it is a rising of the burning
and the priest shall pronounce him clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그를 정결하다고 선언할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for it is an inflammation of the burning
